item.description:
Celebrate the
August Moon Festival

The 24th annual August Moon Festival, largest of its kind on the South Shore, will bring together Asian and non-Asian families from the Greater Boston Area to celebrate diversity and community unity.

There will be lively music and dance performances and activities for all ages, including children and seniors. Local restaurants will serve international cuisine, and more than a hundred vendors composed of businesses and community organizations will participate.

For more information, visit the event website here:

http://www.quincyasia...
item.name: August Moon Festival
